header.description:
Golem API with GameTests! This add-on provides the files needed to generate multiple custom golems.
Requires§oGameTest Framework§r to be enabled.
See the §oREADME.txt§r file located at §ohttps://github.com/cda94581/expert-spoon/add-ons/golem-api/§r for more information about how this pack works, and how to use the pack.
